mapper.select: select * from ACT_JOB where (RETRIES_ > 0) and (DUEDATE_ is null or DUEDATE_ < #{now, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and (LOCK_OWNER_ is null or LOCK_EXP_TIME_ < #{now, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
select * from ACT_JOB where (RETRIES_ > 0) and (LOCK_OWNER_ is not null)

select * from ACT_JOB where (TYPE_ = 'timer') and (DUEDATE_ is not null) and (DUEDATE_ < #{duedate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and (LOCK_OWNER_ is null or LOCK_EXP_TIME_ < #{duedate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) order by DUEDATE_
select * from ACT_JOB where (RETRIES_ > 0) and (TYPE_ = 'timer') and (EXECUTION_ID_ = #{executionId})
select * from ACT_JOB where (RETRIES_ > 0) and (DUEDATE_ is null or DUEDATE_ <= #{now, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and (LOCK_OWNER_ is null or LOCK_EXP_TIME_ <= #{now, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
